General.Name: AH-Vest Limited
General.Description: AH-Vest Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of food products in South Africa. The company offers food sauces and condiments primarily under the All Joy and Veri Per brands. It serves independent traders and catering industry, as well as retail chains, including branded and private label products. AH-Vest Limited was formerly known as All Joy Foods Proprietary Limited. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa. AH-Vest Limited is a subsidiary of Eastern Trading Co (Pty) Ltd.

3.Name: Mr. Raees  Darsot
3.Title: Admin. & Treasury Director and Exec. Director
